description: EZ Shop List is a very simple shopping and other repeat tasks list.  It is designed to be super easy to use.  Comes with basic initial food and drug store items already entered. Lists can be easily searched by typing a couple letters on the keyboard.  Items and List Categories are easily added edited and deleted.  Items can be added to more than one List so when you need toothpaste for example it can be in the Drug Store list and the Grocery list.  Then when at either store the item will be in list.  To keep EZ Shop List simple, things like prices, quantities, other complex, hard to enter things are not part of this app.    EZ Shop List can also be used for any repeating tasks such as "Saturday Errands."
